EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #9.2018 Dealer Update #9A
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | May 2018
GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft
- This Sales Bulletin provides update pricing and product information for the new GoDirect Cabin Router. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-28 Rev A <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/f00IG0q00O00rI20QZXz000]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft
- This sales bulletin provides 2018 updated pricing and ordering information for the Laseref IV. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-11 Rev B <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/GsI0X0200S0OQ0Gq00000Z0]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 LCD Display Upgrades for Business Aircraft
- This sales bulletin provides 2018 updated pricing and product information for DU 875 LCD Display Upgrades - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-10 Rev C <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/ZIZ000rxG0000000M20qXQI]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
